name: Skeletal Alchemist
languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.Magic Resistance: The skeletal alchemist has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Multiattack: The skeletal alchemist makes two Lob Acid attacks.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.
actions.Lob Acid: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) acid damage.
